preferences.name: searchByUrlTarget
preferences.title: Online search URL
preferences.description: This URL will be used to search for images that are publicly available on a server (most images on websites). Only changes this if you want to use a different locale (or search engine) and if you know what you are doing.

preferences.name: searchByBinaryTarget
preferences.title: Local/Inline search URL
preferences.description: This URL will be used to search for local or inline images that need to be uploaded to the search engine. Changing this url will probably break that functionality.
